overview:
Dave is an interactive designer, and entrepreneur.

After Dave finished school at the University of Connecticut, he went out and started a freelance career in graphic web design. After doing this successfully for three years, Dave started Visual Scientists. VS was primarily a Flash web development company, that brought 3D, motion graphics, and high-end ActionScript together to create engaging microsites.

Dave now owns Forest Giant, which is a digital agency. With 10 employees, and more than 1 million in revenue generated yearly, Dave is leading the digital charge with him and his partners in the midwest region. With clients such as GE, Dave and his team are doing everything from Air applications and iPhone apps, to interactive exhibits for CES. Dave and his crew are constantly on the forefront of emerging technologies, and they bring a high creative aesthetic to everything they create.

Dave has been involved with the service industry for many years, but understands the value of developing products as well. His current endeavor, Keepio, promises to be a game changer in the world of social commerce.
